name: Top-Down-Tactics Prototype
description:
An incomplete title for the Top-Down Game Jam. I built it around fighting an AI who moved actively against you, but as it stands they simple defend themselves without maneuvering.

Action points exist, but since turns never change, they're effectively infinite as they keep replenishing.

Things I ran out of time for:

A working AI

death animation

health bar display for targets

I'm absolutely open to suggestions and feedback, even though it's just a prototype.

Hopefully this serves as a lesson and I'll deliver a finished product to my next game jam! :D
